bora.title: Bora – Katabatic wind on the Adriatic
bora.p1: The Bora is a cold, gusty downslope wind along the Adriatic coast that can suddenly reach hurricane force with wind speeds exceeding 200 km/h.
bora.p2: The Bora can be forecast reasonably well using the air-pressure difference between the weather stations in Trieste and Maribor.
bora.p3: When pressure in Trieste is 4 hPa lower (−4 hPa, orange line) than in Maribor, Bora develops; at an 8 hPa difference (−8 hPa, red line) it can become stormy. The thin white line (0 hPa) indicates balanced values.
bora.note: The displayed live weather data (pressure, wind direction and speed) is sourced from Open-Meteo.com, a free platform processing numerical weather models such as ICON and GFS. Note: The data is for visualization and is not officially certified.
